En.Title: Lyashenko Veronika
En.Brief: I would like to express my gratitude and express my sincere thanks to the entire team and Ms. Schmidt-Schmiedebach for their assistance. Your support is very valuable to us, and words cannot describe how important it is for our community to have such caring people around. You not only lightened our burden, but also made life a little better and safer. Your humanity and empathy inspire and support faith in kindness and helping each other. Thank you so much for giving us hope and providing the medical care we need.

Eduard, Igor, Sergey, girls... may all the good that you do for us return to your families in double size. I also want to express my gratitude to Mrs. Schmidt-Schmiedebach, for the help provided! This is incredible help in these difficult times. Thank you, you are incredible people who, despite all the negativity, troubles and difficulties, still continue to do your job and help all those who need it. Strength to you, health I, good luck, may everything work out for you!

En.Title: Olena Shevchenko
En.Brief: Thank you very much for your help! It is extremely important for us to know your sugars.... You are doing a great job! You are the best! I have not seen any charity fund to help diabetics in Ukraine, except yours! We are IDPs, the housing is occupied and destroyed. You have helped us a lot. Thank you very much! May God grant you strength, health, peace and Victory! Do not give up because of disgruntled wards, you are doing a great job! Thank you very much! Keep yourselves! Everything will be Ukraine!

En.Title: Vladlena
En.Brief: Good day! As always, two words won't do 😅 This is the third aid from the fund and every time we think that there is much more! But it turns out that there is room and this is not just a pleasant surprise! In general, it is hard to believe that someone helps and REALLY helps not only with words and promises! Unfortunately, these vital things are not affordable for everyone... Therefore, words simply cannot express our gratitude to the entire foundation and personally to Sergey, Eduard and Mrs. Schmidt-Schmiedebach! For such incredible support🧡

En.Title: Valentina
En.Brief: Good afternoon, dear admins and personally Igor, Alex, as well as dear group. I am very grateful for the sugar substitute and vitamins for diabetes. I received it, I was very happy, very grateful for your concern and care for us diabetics !! especially since I could not pick up either the glucometer or my stevia from Bakhmut. You are very attentive to us. You know that sometimes we also want something sweet. God sees your work and will appreciate it, just as we appreciate it by 10 points. You have already provided and will continue to provide thousands of people with diabetes with your work. Thanks a lot. Peace to all of us!!!!

En.Title: Oksana

Also, for the umpteenth time, I want to thank the fund team for the opportunity to buy monitoring at a very nice price. I wish you prosperity in your hard work, I wish you to find understanding in the apparatus of power and legalize (certify) sugar monitoring in our country, and not only libra.

En.Title: Nadija
En.Brief: I received a sensor today. I sincerely thank all the employees of the foundation for what you are, for your work, for your patience, for your worries, for the sleepless nights, for not leaving diabetics and helping them, your work is invaluable. During the 27 years of experience with diabetes, there were many things, but there were always people on the way who extended a helping hand. Now your fund has helped me a lot. Good health to you and God's grace. THANK YOU VERY MUCH

En.Title: Olena
En.Brief: Thank you very much to the Foundation for the help, and in particular to Eduard and Serhiy for the timely delivery of the sensor to my daughter in the border town of Sumy, thank you very much to Mrs. Schmidt Schmiedebach, who helps our children who are suffering from type 1 diabetes. You make our children's lives much easier. You and the whole team Mr. Eduard and he himself are our guardian angels, who protect ours by sending them the necessary nutrients that this disease needs. Thank you all very much for the sensor, for the sugar substitute, which we need to prepare various goodies that lift our spirits, as well as for the vitamins. which are necessary to strengthen immunity. We wish you all good health, happiness and God's blessing, may the Lord protect you 🙏🙏🙏🙏‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è💛💙 Everything will be Ukraine!!! Thank you from the bottom of my heart 🙏🙏🙏

En.Title: Oksana Sugak
En.Brief: Good day. We received a package with Libra 2, according to the 50/50 program. We sincerely thank the foundation and all employees for this opportunity to purchase a sensor. Thanks to it, we can see a clear picture of our sugars and react quickly and in time to the situation, be it hypoglycemia or hyperglycemia. With Libra 2, the child can sleep peacefully at night, if anything, the alarm will sound and wake him up. We thank Eduard, Serhiy and all the employees who are involved in such a good cause. We wish everyone good health and a peaceful sky above our heads. 💛💙

En.Title: Alina
En.Brief: Sincere thanks for such an incredible opportunity to get a sensor under the 50/50 program. 🙏🙏🙏 This is a great help in times like this. Each of us understands what diabetes is and how difficult it is when it is in your bloodstream. 7 years ago, when we got sick, such a wonderful device was like some kind of fantasy! And now the fingers are not so tired. 😃😃😃. A low bow to the entire team, who work tirelessly, who spend so much effort, time, and finances, often neglecting their affairs and families, but helping all of us ‚ô•Ô∏è. You are incredible people!!!! No, you are not people, you are superheroes!!! Thank you!

En.Title: Nadia Novachuk

She is like a breath of fresh air when difficulties pile up and do not let you breathe! I am glad, I am proud that there are such sensitive, generous-hearted and caring people in the world! I ask you to accept my sincere gratitude and good wishes for health, peace, never to lose the kindness of your soul and mercy.

I have already received help many times, and for free, and through the help of the fund, and under the 50/50 program! Thank you for being you, you are doing a great job! Let all this good return to you twice! Peaceful sky to all! I want to hug everyone, always pleasant communication, good attitude, and also such valuable help‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

En.Title: Larisa
En.Brief: Thank you all so much. For the fact that during the war, when it is hard for everyone, you really help. Do incredible things. Spending your strength and health to help others. Looking for and seeking help. Such people will raise Ukraine. Good always comes back a hundredfold. Good attracts good. We Ukrainians are strong and self-sufficient, strong-willed. When you look at our defenders, you are full of pride. These are our brave boys and girls. Look at the volunteers. These are strong-minded and purposeful boys and girls. Well, there is no other nation like us in the whole world. The whole universe is blue-yellow. We are strong, indomitable, strong-willed. And we will defeat that poor army. And God willing, we will defeat that damned diabetes. And whoever doesn't like it, let him go another way. There are things, actions - priceless. Every person has a gift. The gift of being human. But not all people keep it, it gets lost somewhere... and you haven't lost it. Hold fast this gift. To the evil of all enemies!))) Good health and success in all your endeavors. Glory to Ukraine!

En.Title: Ludmila
En.Brief: Good day. Today I received 2 pounds. Happiness has no limits. I want to thank Eduard, Igor and everyone, every person who helps this charitable project. In our difficult time, when more and more children need financial help, it is difficult to find people who are able to perceive other people's problems as their own, and how wonderful that such people are still there is. A huge thank you and a low bow to you!!! It is a great happiness for us to be able to control sugars in children. Someone is happy with a new toy, a dress, but for us the best gift is a libra, because the life and health of my children depend on it. Today is World Diabetes Day. I wish everyone that diabetes becomes curable!!! For now, let's stick to health-supporting drugs. Thanks for creating this group! And may God grant that the good that you give to people will return to you a hundredfold!!!

En.Title: Tatyana Minets

The 50/50 program that you launched is like salvation for today. The child is happy and we, the parents, are with her. We are very grateful...Hopefully it will all be over soon, victory will be ours and everyone will be fine, and then we will be able to contribute more to the rehabilitation center fund.
